name: Zero Possession
description:
You are outnumbered and outgunned. In this fast-paced, first-person platformer you must use your wits and your speed to slay your way through a dystopian Tokyo. Dash around on city rooftops, launch yourself sword-first into enemies or shoot from afar, and listen to some nice elevator music at the end.

Winner of Best Sound, Best Fourth Year, and People's Choice awards at GameCon 2022. 

Move fluidly through a futuristic Tokyo

Take on the Beans

Hamraj Rai - Level Designer, Project Manager

Carter Menary - Sound Designer, Composer

Anthony Smiderle -  AI Programmer, Combat Programmer

Daniel Hong - Gameplay Programmer

Marcus Vine - Environment Artist

Dhruva Guruprasad - 3D Generalist

Jeremy Kan - Concept Artist, UI Artist
